name: Driving School - Car Parking and Driving
name_original: Driving School - Car Parking and Driving
description:
Driving School - Car Parking and Driving
Drive the best Sports and Luxury Cars that are fast and furious!  Get into the driving seat of your favourite car, put your car in gear and accelerate to move forward. Can you clear each test without crashing?
Show your precision driving and smooth car parking skills in this realistic Driving School - Car Parking and Driving game.
Claim Your Driving License Now!
FEATURES
Huge parking lot, with beautiful shiny cars
Manoeuvre your car between various obstacles
Smooth and realistic handling
Exciting achievements
Many exotic cars to choose from
Easy to learn and drive
Stunning 3D graphics
Driving School - Car Parking and Driving has the top of the line, exotic cars! One is better than the other! Upgrade your car so it is more powerful and can sustain car crashes.
An amazing, physics based car parking simulator game, Driving School - Car Parking and Driving is fun and challenging. Navigate your car with the utmost precision, through the parking lot to your destined parking spot. Reverse parking makes the Driving School - Car Parking and Driving even more challenging & exciting!
This physics based, Driving School - Car Parking and Driving game will test your parking abilities and your car steering skills! Manoeuvre your car between small spaces, realistic traffic, a busy parking lot and many other obstacles, to park without crashing. Be careful you don’t crash or you will fail the level.
To make Driving School - Car Parking and Driving, more exciting, we have two play modes for you to select from. Select the more relaxed Free Ride Mode or race against the clock in the Timed Mode.
You can also select the difficulty level in Driving School - Car Parking and Driving. Play the Rookie difficulty mode or challenge yourself in the Professional difficulty mode.
